item.description:
You probably were up at 6 AM to cook for the whole family, the twins spent the whole day screaming and pulling each others hair out, Aunt Lorraine and Uncle Leroy were screaming at each other across the table, and little Meg decided today was a great day to become a Vegan. By the next day, all you wanted to do is get out of there. Fortunately, old FAN Alliance has an escape for you, its called games. Even if this doesn't describe you, come over anyway.

This is a potluck, so bring over your favorite leftover from Thanksgiving or a dessert and your favorite games. I will email directions to those who RSVP YES.
item.name: After Thanksgiving Games
